title: How A Cuban Spy Had A Baby While Imprisoned
teaser: Sperm from a member of the Cuban Five was delivered to Havana so the prisoner's wife could be artificially inseminated. Host Audie Cornish speaks with NPR's Scott Horsley about the Senate staffer who made the delivery.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
